name: Mollow
description:
Mollow is an experimental cooperative game for 2 players.

The goal is to throw the object as far as you can to reach the idol on either side.

This game jam was made for DTGMA-II.


Controls

Player 1
[Up, Down, Left, Right] Move character
[Enter] Throw object

Player 2
[W,S,A,D] Move character
[Space] Throw object


Credits (2012)
Dom2D - Art
technobeanie - Game Design, Programming & Music
